main.name: Minseop Noh
main.bio: I'm a Software Developer who has a dream to transform the ideas to make it real in this world. I have a desire to learn and improve my skills as much as possible. I prefer to use React, Node, and AWS as a MERN stack or cloud developer. I am looking for opportunity to make a scalable web application with latest Front-end and back-end technologies.

education.description: I have gained about the knowledge of software, hardware, and network skills through Computer Engineering Technology at Seneca College; software:language such as C, C++, C#, Java, Python, PHP and Operating Systems such as Linux, Windows; hardware: Troubleshooting, Circuit Design; Network: Cisco Network, Network Design.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: I worked on managing and developing web check-in service for BMO as a full stack developer. Main language that I used during work was React, AWS, Node.js, Laravel, and NoSQL. I mostly focused on the Ajax to render the data from Server connected with NoSQL and send the data to Front-end part using RESTful API.

projects.title: AWS Serverless audiobook application
projects.category: Audiobooks convert users text into lifelike speech offering over 20 languages and 50 human-like voice types to select from

projects.title: Seoul Economy News App
projects.category: Hybrid app based on React Native
